name: Nukular Falling Tower
description:
Description

Escape this toxic wasteland known as NFTs - er, that is, the Nukular Falling Tower! You must dodge falling debris and equip yourself with protective hats, strategically use your jetpack and dodge abilities to make it through to the end in one piece!

For the best experience, download below !

Controls

Start: Enter

Move left/right: A/D

Glide: J

Dodge: K

Credits

Nateycakes - Art

Sodor  - Music, SFX, & Art

Blearn - Programming
